action() Method Prints/throws RuntimeException as "Error Code 2: There was a power outage".
action() - Method in class Terminate
action() Method Stops execution and prints/throws RuntimeException as "Error Code 0: The system is shutting down normally".

action() Method Prints ThermostatDay Event, which calls toString override below.

actionPerformed() Default Method - Can be ignored.
addTuple(SystemState) - Static method in class GreenhouseControls
addTuple() Method Takes SystemState Tuple and adds it to the HashMap to save the Tuple's hardware as the key and the action it performed.
allowExecution() - Static method in class Event
allowExecution() Method Allows Events to be executed.

G

gcResume() - Method in class GreenhouseControls
gcResume() Method Resumes Events Iterates through all Event objects in gcEvents and calls resumeEvent() method on them all
gcRunning() - Method in class GreenhouseControls
gcRunning() Method Checks if Threads are running Iterates through all Threads in gc and calls isAlive() method on them all, if true then it returns true otherwise it returns false
gcSuspend() - Method in class GreenhouseControls
gcSuspend() Method Suspends Events Iterates through all Event objects in gcEvents and calls suspendEvent() method on them all
getAttempt() - Method in class Event
getAttempt() Method Returns an Events attemptAction Used to check if an Event has attempted to run yet or not
getState() - Method in class Event
getState() Method Returns the state from a SystemState Tuple
getSystemState(String) - Method in class GreenhouseControls
getSystemState() Method Takes a String, uses it as a Key and iterates through the gcStates HashMap to print the corresponding value Example: getSystemState("Bell") would iterate through the HashMap looking for the Key "Bell" and print it's findings as: "Event: Bell - Action performed: Ring"
GreenhouseControls - Class in <Unnamed>
GreenhouseControls Class - Controls the Greenhouse and contains the entry point for the application.
GreenhouseControls() - Constructor for class GreenhouseControls
GreenhouseControls Constructor Loads the GUI, sends output to textArea in GUI through GUIOutput's .setOut() method and assigns a custom exception handler for Threads.
GreenhouseGUI - Class in <Unnamed>
GreenhouseGUI Class - A GUI to be used with GreenhouseControls.
GreenhouseGUI(GreenhouseControls) - Constructor for class GreenhouseGUI
GreenhouseGUI Constructor Creates GUI, its Menu Items, Popup Menu Items, Menu Bar, Text Area, Buttons, etc.
GUIOutput - Class in <Unnamed>
GUIOutput - Sends output to the GUI
GUIOutput(GreenhouseGUI) - Constructor for class GUIOutput
GUIOutput Constructor Takes GreenhouseGUI objects and captures it to toGUI then overrides println for String and Object to call toTextArea() method

Main
makeSystemState(String, Event) - Method in class GreenhouseControls
makeSystemState() Method Takes a String and Event object to create a SystemState Tuple and adds it to gcState HashMap by calling addTuple() method.

R

restart(String) - Method in class GreenhouseControls
restart() Method Adds Events dynamically from a text file and runs them as seperate Threads
restartEvent() - Method in class Event
restartEvent() Method Resets executionTime and startTime.
restartEvents() - Method in class GreenhouseControls
restartEvents() Method Starts the Events again that were loaded from the dump.out file Creates a new ArrayList of Threads, iterates through gcEvents to see if any events haven't been attempted, if they haven't been attempted then they will be Threaded and ran.
restoreGreenhouseControls(String) - Static method in class GreenhouseControls
restoreGreenhouseControls() Method Restores object from dump.out file Uses ObjectInputStream to restore serialized object
resumeEvent() - Method in class Event
resumeEvent() Method Resumes Events from suspension.
run() - Method in class Event
run() Method Controls the execution of the event While system's current time is before the Event's execution time, run.

S

setAttempt() - Method in class Event
setAttempt() Method Sets attemptAction to true
shutdown(String) - Method in class GreenhouseControls
shutdown() Method Shuts the system down when an error takes place Serializes gc to dump.out and logs the error that took place to error.log Prints to textArea what problem occured.
shutdownGreenhouse(int) - Method in class GreenhouseGUI
shutdownGreenhouse() Method Sets the buttons (to enabled or disabled) depending on what state the system is currently in.
state - Variable in class SystemState
 
stopExecution() - Static method in class Event
stopExecution() Method Stops Events from executing.
suspendEvent() - Method in class Event
suspendEvent() Method Suspends Events.

T

terminate(int) - Method in class GreenhouseControls
terminate() Method Terminates system normally Threads a new instance of Terminate() which proceeds to stop all threads and shuts down the system normally.
Terminate - Class in <Unnamed>
Terminate Class - Terminates the Events that are currently running and shuts down the system normally.

Terminate Constructor Stops execution and shuts system down.
